types:type.name: create_data_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type create_data_json = {| accountNum: String, atmPin: String, ifscCode: String, depositAmount: Number {"typeId": "int"}, mailId: String, contact: String |} {"example": "{\\\"accountNum\\\":\\\"1234567890\\\",\\\"atmPin\\\":\\\"1234\\\",\\\"ifscCode\\\":\\\"1234\\\",\\\"depositAmount\\\":2546,\\\"mailId\\\":\\\"phani@gmail.com\\\",\\\"contact\\\":\\\"9999999999\\\"}"}
